definitions: A member of a Germanic people that invaded the Roman Empire from the east between the 3rd and 5th centuries. The eastern division, the Ostrogoths, founded a kingdom in Italy, while the Visigoths went on to found one in Spain.
A style of rock music derived from punk, typically with apocalyptic or mystical lyrics.
A member of a subculture favouring black clothing, white and black make-up, and goth music.
